{{Wired embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=BEFCMU10 |revision=v3 |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/09/2003 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Askey |manuf_model=CME105-D40 |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=cable modem |fcc_id=Q87-BEFCMU10V3 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.6 |pwr_conn=barrel, reverse gender core |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3348;QAMLink(R), BCM3348KPB, CC0428 P11, 724543 N; |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=2 MiB |fla1_brand=AMD |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 MiB |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-7 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB (unk. standard - slave) |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, connectorized,, populated |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=Cable Tuner;Broadcom;BCM3416;BROADCOM(R), BCM3416KQTE, TT0422 P10, 722344;1; ,,, Cable Modem LNA;Broadcom;BCM3401;BCM3401, KS3 P30, TS0430, 724980;1; |flags=schematics, block diagram, DOCSIS 2.0 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:0F:66 }} BEFCMU10v3 S/Ns may start with '''KBG4'''.
The FCC docs indicate this device is an '''Askey''' CME105-D40. The EUT's board is silkscreened with "3003-000763".
"ID:03-000013", "REV-1A", and "3003-001103" is silkscreened on a production model board.
==Probable used PSU(s)== The power supply shown with the device in the FCC photos is a '''Delta Electronics''' ADP-12SB Rev.B.
{{hasPowerSupply |brand=Delta Electronics |model=ADP-12S |revision=B |input_v=100-240 |input_a=0.5 |input_c=AC |input_hz=50-60 |input_conn=C13 |output_v=12 |output_a=1 |output_conn=barrel |output_c=DC |manuf_country=China |style=modular, brick }}
